values: 多余的，剩下的；备用的，额外的
To spare something is to give it away because it is not needed.
I wanted to help him but I couldn’t spare a tire.
n. 剩余；备用零件
vt. 节约，吝惜；饶恕；分出，分让

Spare means to give or provide something extra or in addition to what is required.
adjective, noun, verb
Additional or surplus to requirements, or free time available for leisure activities.
